explains: n. 仙人掌科植物，仙人掌

sentences.en: Researchers observed one bird impale a rodent on a cactus.
sentences.cn: 研究人员观察到，一只鸟把一个啮齿动物钉到了一棵仙人掌上。

sentences.en: The road winds for miles through parched earth, scrub and cactus.
sentences.cn: 那条路蜿蜒数英里，穿过干热的土地、灌木丛和仙人掌，。

sentences.en: Don't water the cactus every day.
